concept.title: Getting Started
concept.shortdesc: This section helps you get started using your Eucalyptus cloud, uncluding an overview of the features available to end users how to sign up for an account, get credentials, and set the environment variables that enable you to interact with Eucalyptus.

conbody.p: In order to use Eucalyptus, you need to sign up, get credentials, and get Euca2ools. After you have the credentials and a way to access Eucalyptus, you can start using your cloud.
